thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Irobot Corp Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.71

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Irobot Corp Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.71
text:
iRobot Corp:
* IROBOT REPORTS FIRST-QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.71 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.49 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $1.05 BILLION TO $1.08 BILLION * Q1 REVENUE $217.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $214.2 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 19 TO 22 PERCENT * REAFFIRMING 2018 FULL-YEAR REVENUE AND OPERATING INCOME EXPECTATIONS
* INCREASING FULL-YEAR 2018 EXPECTATIONS FOR EARNINGS PER SHARE
* SEES 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.15 - $2.40
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.31, REVENUE VIEW $1.07 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
